Behind every successful product there is always a process of study and experimentation that starts at the drawing board of the designers and arrives at the finished product. For this limited edition Dèsea @lavazzait designed by @gufram and presented at Fuorisalone 2019, the stylists of the two companies chose to entrust Kaos Design with the complex aesthetic finish. The aim was to recreate the same metallic hue as the iconic coffee packaging. Kaos Design's Kolors department had to modify the versatile Metal-K cycle into a version that would not alter the structure of the prototypes, which were made using the stereolithography technique. Once the painting cycle was found, the colour creation phase began. The result is Dèsea Lavazza elegantly dressed Metal-K satin gold and glossy finish.

Iced Cinnamon Dolce Latte  
I knew not to froth my cold foam in the tiny espresso shot glass  anyways!

What I used 
- 2 starbucks blonde espresso pods
- 1 - 2 tsps of Cinnamon Dolce syrup (Jordan’s skinny syrups)
- creamer
- heavy whipping cream
- ice

Cold Foam:
- 1/3  cup of heavy cream
- 1-2 tbsp creamer or milk
- 1/2 tsp cinnamon dolce syrup 

Recipe  
1. Brew your espresso shots and add both your syrup and espresso to your drinking glass. Mix together well.
2. Next, add your ice and then milk (or creamer) to your coffee. Add your milk/creamer if preferred. 
3. Froth your heavy cream, creamer or milk, and syrup until you have a thick consistency.
4. Add frothed milk to your drinking glass and enjoy!
